column5: I’m almost back on line after major HD failure   , but I’m getting there. It looks that for me problems happen in doubles. First the car. Went for emission test to learn that my Buick Regal needs new engine (blue smoke symptom). For 12 years old car with 250 k  this was not an option. Time to get something newer. It took couple  days to find what I’ve wanted and here it is:       Then computer problem, still working on it.  On a positive note we have new member of the family.       Finally after missing two fishing weekends everything went back to normal  Weekend report shortly.
Hey Keram, nice little car you got there, and an even cuter puppy   What kind is it? name?  Good luck with the 'puter, they can be a pain sometimes.  Maureen
congrats on the car and puppy
50/50 c spaniel and bichon, 10 weeks old. My daughter's picked the name - Rosie
